alert.note: Alert for Mesa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 18 at 11:12AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central Colorado and east central Utah, including the following counties, in west central Colorado, Mesa. Including the city of Gateway. In east central Utah, Grand. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1109 AM MDT, gage reports indicated snowmelt. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gateway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
